pronunciation.pinyin: dào suǒ cún zhě , nǎi shī suǒ cún zhě
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: dao4 suo3 cun2 zhe3 , nai3 shi1 suo3 cun2 zhe3

meanings.value: If sb has grasped the truth before you, take him as your teacher (Tang dynasty essayist Han Yu 韓愈|韩愈[Han2 Yu4]).
We should learn from one who knows the way.
